definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be afraid, fear (Ph. in n.pr. [[יגר אשמן]] = he feareth Eshmun; Ar.wajira metuens cavit, Frey: Lag:BN 26.30; cf. III. [[גּוּר]])—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[יׇגׁרְתָּ]] De 28:60; [[יׇגּׂרְתִּי]] De 9:19 + 3 t.;—be afraid, sq. [[מִפְּנֵי]] before, of; of wrath of ´[[י]] De 9:19; of diseases of Egypt De 28:60; fear, sq. acc. Job 3:25, Job 9:28, Ps 119:39.
